analysis.key_quote: The proposed reclassification could lead to a chilling effect to at-will employees, who may refrain from providing their unbiased subject matter expertise if it could be perceived as "unfaithful".
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the chilling effect on unbiased expertise, and the adequacy of existing merit-based systems. It emphasizes the importance of due process and the risks associated with the proposed changes.
